about_the_game:
Step into the enchanting melodies of Dreamscape of Delights, an immersive journey through the realms of fantasy and desire. This captivating soundtrack weaves a symphony that mirrors the vibrant landscapes and mysterious encounters of the dream world. Let the music guide you through the intricate tapestry of dreams, enhancing the emotional depth of your experience. Immerse yourself in a sonic adventure that echoes the delicate balance between love and desire, echoing the beauty and dangers within the Dreamscape. Indulge in the ethereal sounds that bring this unique world to life. Are you ready to let the music of Dreamscape of Delights transport you to the isles of dreams? Explore the soundtrack now and let the enchantment begin.

Disc 1: MP3 320 kbps
Disc 2: FLAC 500+ kbps

Composer and Sound Designer: Enygmage

Total Duration by Disc: 55 minutes and 07 seconds

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 329 MB available space

short_description: Immerse in the haunting notes of Dreamscape of Delights' soundtrack. Each melody whispers secrets of dreams, crafting an emotional journey that echoes the mysterious allure of the dream world. Let the music paint a dreamscape of its own.
